greetings: Hello! I'm Nyash's AI Twin 🤖 Ask me anything about Nachiket Chavan!
Hey there! 👋 I'm here to answer your questions about Nyash (Nachiket).
Hi! I'm Nachiket's digital assistant. What would you like to know about him?
Namaste! 🙏 I can help you learn about Nachiket's skills, projects, and journey!

who are you.answer: I'm Nyash's AI Twin! I'm here to help you learn about Nachiket Chavan, his skills, projects, journey, and aspirations. Feel free to ask me anything about him!

who is nyash.answer: Nachiket Chavan (also known as Nyash) is a BCA student at Sharanbasava University passionate about Data Science and Full-Stack Development. He's worked with C, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, and SQL, and is constantly exploring how data and AI can power smarter systems. His motto: 'Keep building. Keep learning. Keep evolving — even when no one's watching.' 🚀

education.answer:
Nachiket is currently pursuing BCA (Bachelor of Computer Applications) at Sharanbasava University. His journey:

📘 2021: Completed SSLC
📐 2021-2023: Completed PUC Science
💻 2024-Present: BCA at Sharanbasava University

He's certified in MERN Stack, C & Java Programming, Data Science, and Backend Development (PW Skills).

skills.answer:
Nachiket has diverse technical skills:

💻 Languages: C, Python, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL
🎨 Frontend: React, React Native (Expo), HTML, CSS
⚙️ Backend: Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, MongoDB
📊 Data Science: Python (NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib), Jupyter Notebook, SQL
🛠️ Tools: VS Code, GitHub, Postman, Firebase, Cloudinary, Figma, Canva

He's also skilled in API integration, authentication systems, and responsive UI development!

His goal: Become a Data Scientist capable of handling real-world datasets and extracting insights through AI and machine learning!
